item.description:
Organizer for this event is Bernice.
;0)

Saturday, July 14, 2007, 11:00 AM
Where:
East Bay Bike Path
RTE 195
Riverside , RI 02915


Let's make a day of it. We will meet at the Parking lot in Riverside, RI
Ride our Bicycles to Bristol, have lunch by the water, ride back and stop at Warren Town Beach for a swim, we can use the outdoor shower to wash off the salt, put dry clothes on and head back to the parking lot. For those that want to join New England Singles later in the day we will travel by car to Providence have dinner and watch the Waterfires. Come with a backpack or a basket on your bike to hold, beach towel, suntan lotion and dry clothes. Don't forget water and a helmet!

See you then!
Bernice
http://www.riparks.co...

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: East Bay Bike Path
